title: Raven's Gate
description: Welcome to the dark side of Anthony Horowitz.When Matt Freeman gets into trouble with the police, he's sent to be fostered in Yorkshire.It's not long before he senses there's something wrong with his guardian, and the entire village.Then Matt learns about the Old Ones and begins to understand just how different. But no one will believe him, and no one can help.
author: Anthony Horowitz
